Author: ph03nix#3115

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: Also use z_mergetoaddress on node without filter, to merge all "free money" into a single uxto, node with filter received as normal, as it sees they are from itself and allows in. SO far it seems its working perfectly.

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: Might need a user configurable size, hard coded it to 1 coin, but that not always going to be enough.

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: Also it takes all vouts and does an everage size, as you cant just ignore a single utxo, have to add whole tx to wallet... Might be ways around this, such as ending 1000 utxo to 1 address and 1 utxo to the notary wallet... forcing it to add all the uselss utxos, need to investigate this possibility.

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: Acutally limiting tx to less than 10 vouts, seems a decent thing to add ..

Author: ph03nix#3115
Content:
Mylo(KomodoPioneers)Today at 3:36 AM
@Privatoshi i asked a similar question only yesterday about bundling unique digital assets
non-fungible tokens are possible right now with the tokens contract.
We just need to use 1 satoshi of KMD(or whatever base coin) to create the tokens, 
then only one token with an id is created (so it has a unique token id). 
Later, whoever has the token can add op-return data to it.
GUI side can deal with the rules on how the OP-return data is interpreted

creating bundles of assets can be done with another CC that enforces such restrictions
